languages.text: {n}На тех клочках плоти, что выглядывают из под стали, видны жуткие химические ожоги. Периодически по телу слуги Омниссии пробегают судороги, и из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} раздается болезненное шипение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На тех клочках плоти, что выглядывают из под стали, видны жуткие химические ожоги. Периодически по телу слуги Омниссии пробегают судороги, и из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} раздается болезненное шипение.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На тех клочках плоти, что выглядывают из под стали, видны жуткие химические ожоги. Периодически по телу слуги Омниссии пробегают судороги, и из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} раздается болезненное шипение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Scraps of flesh that show from under the steel have terrible chemical burns on them. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Omnissiah's servant's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.locale_text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}鋼の下に見える肉の欠片にはひどい化学的熱傷があった。時折痙攣が技術司祭の身体を襲い、痛みを伴う痛々しい音が彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から聞こえてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鋼の下に見える肉の欠片にはひどい化学的熱傷があった。時折痙攣が技術司祭の身体を襲い、痛みを伴う痛々しい音が彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から聞こえてきた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫的护甲下面露出了血肉，上面带着严重的化学灼伤痕迹。每隔一段时间，他壮硕的躯体就会不断颤抖，{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统中发出痛苦的嘶嘶声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位欧姆尼塞亚的仆人护甲下面露出了血肉，上面带着严重的化学灼伤痕迹。每隔一段时间，他壮硕的躯体就会不断颤抖，{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统中发出痛苦的嘶嘶声。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Das unter dem Stahl zu sehende Fleisch ist von schweren chemischen Verbrennungen gezeichnet. Immer wieder durchfahren Krämpfe den Körper des Techpriesters, aus dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} ein schmerzerfülltes Zischen erklingt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unter dem Stahl hervorscheinendes Fleisch weist schwere chemische Verbrennungen auf. Immer wieder durchfahren Krämpfe den Körper des Dieners des Omnissiah, und sein {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} gibt ein nach Schmerzen klingendes Zischen von sich.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Les lambeaux de chair qui transparaissent sous les plaques d'acier portent de terribles traces de brûlures chimiques. Le technoprêtre souffre régulièrement de convulsions et un sifflement dolent émane de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lambeaux de chair qui transparaissent sous les plaques d'acier portent de terribles traces de brûlures chimiques. Le technoprêtre souffre régulièrement de convulsions et un sifflement dolent émane de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Los jirones de carne que asoman bajo el acero están marcados con terribles quemaduras químicas. De vez en cuando, unas convulsiones sacuden el cuerpo del tecnosacerdote y su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco sintetizador{/g} emite bufidos de dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los jirones de carne que asoman bajo el acero tienen terribles quemaduras químicas. De vez en cuando, unas convulsiones sacuden el cuerpo del siervo del Omnissiah y su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vocosintetizador{/g} emite bufidos de dolor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Metalin altından az da olsa görülebilen bedeni, korkunç kimyasal yanıklarla bezeli. Tekno Rahip'in vücudu ara sıra kasılmalarla titriyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} acı dolu tıslamalar çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slivers of flesh revealed under the steel are marked with terrible chemical burns. Every now and then, convulsions shake the Tech-Priest's body, and a painful-sounding hiss comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Metalin altından az da olsa görülebilen bedeni, korkunç kimyasal yanıklarla bezeli. Tekno Rahip'in bedeni arada sırada kasılmalarla titriyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}undan acı dolu bir tıslama çıkıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus
